messages.title: Strong Leadership. A clear economic plan. A brighter, more secure future.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protecting the greenbelt and the local environment
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting to halt planning decisions undermining local communities. Strong record and standing up for greenbelt. Ensuring next generation enjoys the environment as we do.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Ed Miliband, Nicola Sturgeon, Nigel Farage

issues.economy: Job total hits record high while wages surge. Tax cuts for workers and savers. A better future for you, your family and Britain.
issues.education: Delivering more choice in education with free schools and academies.
issues.environment: Protecting the greenbelt and the local environment to secure our quality and way of life.

housing.content: Resisting developments that threaten the greenbelt and spoil our environment.

leaflet.personalStatement: I will resist developments that threaten the greenbelt and spoil our environment.

images.caption: Sam Gyimah Delivering for East Surrey

leaflet.additionalNotes: On 7th May, your vote will deliver: Competent leadership or Coalition Chaos. Britain can't afford it. You'll have to pay for it.
